title: Oklahoma Used The Wrong Drug To Execute Charles Warner
text: Posts: 605 Oklahoma Used The Wrong Drug To Execute Charles Warner What the hell is going on here? Maybe the states should just stop killing people, and we can avoid these stupid mistakes. It doesn't make any sense. Quote: Originally Posted by Lyzza What the hell is going on here? Maybe the states should just stop killing people, and we can avoid these stupid mistakes. It doesn't make any sense. Oklahoma Used The Wrong Drug To Execute Charles Warner : The Two-Way : NPR he raped and killed an 11 month old baby and you are concerned about what kind of potassium he got? if it was up to me i would have used draino or sulfuric acid so he would have died in agony!!
